settings.title: FREE SHIPPING
settings.dialog_context:
Shipping fee

USA excluded Alaska and Hawaii

For products like projectors, screens and accessories, it is free standard shipment and the delivery time is  3-4 business days after the order is processed.

For products like Smart cabinet and  Vanish Rollable Laser TV, the shipping fee is from $150-$500 depending on the size and the style. The delivery time is 90 days after the order is processed.

Other US states, territories, and other countries

For products like projectors, screens, and accessories, the shipping fee is as follows:

Australia: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Canada: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-10 business days.

EU & UK: $100 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Hong Kong & Macao SAR: Free standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 days.

View more >

settings.title: AWOL’S COMMITMENTS
settings.dialog_context:
Free Return within 30 days

Undamaged products may be returned for a full refund for any reason within 30 days of the delivery date. Once the returned item arrives back in Awol Vision’s warehouse 16 Technology Dr, Suite 133, Irvine, CA 92618 for inspection, the refund process will begin.

View more >

24 Month Hassle-Free Warranty

Elevation Technology Partners (AWOL Vision) warrants our products to be free from defects in workmanship and materials, under normal residential or commercial use and conditions, for a period as listed below.
Laser TV / Projectors/Screens: 1-year limited warranty & 1-year free extended warranty (total 2-year warranty)
Smart Cabinets: 5 years on the cabinet; 2 years on mechanical and electrical components
Accessories: 1-year limited warranty

60 Days Price Match Guarantee

AWOL guarantees that we will refund you the difference if you find a lower price from us within 30 days of your purchase.

Lifetime Customer Support

We are committed to providing lifelong customer service support, so if you need help, please contact us.

settings.content:
Note:

The ultra short throw ALR projector screen is ONLY compatible with ultra short throw laser projectors, not compatible with long throw projectors.

Maximizes Your Laser TV Experience

AWOL Vision UST projector screen achieves 80% Image quality improvement, provides contrast levels that are up to 100 times greater than standard matte white screens for premium color fidelity.

95% Ceiling Ambient Light Rejecting

The cirriform optical surface lens microstructure negates the washout effect of ambient light especially from overhead sources up to 95%, brings vivid colors and crisp images to you.

Ultra-Wide Viewing Angle

Up to 170°viewing angle allows you to spread out while maintaining uniform picture quality, no matter where you are in the room.

America-Based Service

Based in Delray Beach Florida, AWOL Vision opens up the 1st UST Projector Specialty Store in the US for a live experience. In addition, we provide 1 year warranty and Us based on 24/7 customer service and local maintenance. Phone and Live chat assistants are available .

settings.title: FAQ
settings.content:
1. What is the Cinematic ALR Screen?

AWOL Vision’s Cinematic Ambient Light Rejection (ALR) screen features Ceiling Light Rejecting material. This incredible innovation absorbs a whopping 95% of overhead lighting. The surface is crafted with a micro-cirriform optical structure that filters out ceiling light, giving you picture-perfect quality. It’s perfect for cozy nights in or living rooms without intense lighting.

2. How to choose between Cinematic and Daylight？

Cinematic Screen:

Great for rejecting overhead lights (e.g., ceiling lamps or spotlights).

Best in dimly lit environments without strong side lighting during the day. ( e.g., living rooms or bedrooms)

Daylight Screen:

Blocks both side and overhead light.

Ideal for use throughout the day and night.

3. Is the ALR Screen a Must-Have for UST Projection?

While projecting directly onto a white wall is possible, it's important to note that most walls aren't perfectly flat. This can result in wavy patterns that might impact your viewing experience. When paired with a high-quality UST projector, an ALR screen effectively absorbs ambient light thanks to its specialized material, minimizing the washout effect caused by surrounding light sources. This significantly enhances contrast, and brightness, elevating picture quality by up to 80%.

4. What Sets AWOL Vision’s ALR Cinematic Screen Apart from Others?

The gain and contrast of the screen is a seesaw - high gain brings low contrast. AWOL Vision’s ALR  Cinematic Screen features TPU HBSP high-contrast material. This unique technology maintains high gain without compromising contrast, allowing us to deliver contrast levels up to 100 times greater than standard matte white projection screens.

5. Is the AWOL Vision ALR Screen compatible with other Ultra Short Throw laser projectors?

Absolutely, AWOL Vision ALR screen is compatible with all UST projectors.

6. Can I Install the ALR Screen on My Own?

Certainly, you can install it yourself by following the user manual or the installation guide video. Typically, it takes two people about 1-2 hours to complete the installation.

7. Is There a Customer Support Team?

Absolutely. Our Customer Support team is at your service around the clock, accessible through email, chat, and phone. Our team is located in Florida. You can reach out to us via Facebook or the live chat on our website, or simply give us a call.

Note: The ultra short throw ALR projector screen is ONLY compatible with ultra-short throw laser projector, not compatible with long throw projector

settings.title: Q1: Can this ALR screen effectively display both 4K and 3D content?
settings.answer: Yes, the Cinematic ALR Screen excels in showing both 4K and 3D content. It offers superb clarity and depth, making it a top choice for enhancing any home theater setup, especially with ultra-short throw projectors

settings.title: Q2: What environments are ideal for the Cinematic Screen?
settings.answer: The screen excels in any lighting, making it ideal for various environments, from brightly lit living rooms to darker conference areas. It ensures quality viewing in spaces with fluctuating ambient light.

settings.title: Q3: Is the Cinematic Screen suitable for gaming?
settings.answer: Absolutely, its high gain and excellent ambient light rejection make it ideal for gaming, providing sharp images and vibrant colors.

settings.title: Q4: What makes the Cinematic ALR Screen ideal for home theater?
settings.answer: The Cinematic Screen is designed for ultra-short throw projectors, excels in any lighting with its superior ambient light rejection. Perfect for home theaters, it delivers vivid colors and deep blacks, enhancing your cinematic experience. Available up to 150 inches, it's ideal for expansive, immersive viewing.

settings.title: Q5: Can it be used with any ultra-short throw projector?
settings.answer: Yes, the AWOL Vision Cinematic UST Screen is compatible with other leading brands of ultra-short throw projectors. It enhances viewing quality in any home theater setup, especially effective in ambient light conditions.

settings.title: Q6: What materials are used in the Cinematic Screen?
settings.answer: It features a sturdy 0.4" aluminum frame for durability and style. The screen itself, made from eco-friendly TPU with a BlackGrid structure, is designed for wall-mounted setups and excels in ambient light conditions.

settings.title: Q7: How easy is it to install the Cinematic Screen?
settings.answer: The Cinematic Screen is designed for easy, DIY installation. It's a wall-mounted screen that includes all necessary brackets and a detailed guide. For larger screens, having an extra pair of hands is recommended to ensure proper alignment and tensioning.

settings.title: Q8: What warranty does the Cinematic Screen offer?
settings.answer: Cinematic Screen is covered by a total two-year warranty that protects against material and manufacturing defects. For full warranty details, please visit our warranty page.

settings.title: Q9: Is the screen material flame retardant?
settings.answer: Yes, the screen material is flame retardant, adding an extra layer of safety to your home theater setup.

settings.title: Q10: How do I maintain and clean this screen?
settings.answer: It is easy to maintain. Dust regularly with a soft microfiber cloth and use a damp cloth with mild soap for any marks. Always wipe horizontally to protect the screen's structure and avoid harsh chemicals to maintain its quality.

settings.title: Q11: Can the Cinematic ALR Screen be used outdoors?
settings.answer: The Cinematic ALR Screen is primarily intended for indoor use due to its wall-mount design. For outdoor cinema experiences, you can consider the Cinematic+ Motorized Floor Rising Projector Screen, which is more suited to outdoor environments, like yards.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
